prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered cosmic dancing pose within geometric mandala circle, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Flower of Life, Merkaba, Vesica Piscis patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast and neutral grey ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and Metatron's Cube emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with primordial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor PARAOAN's profile: 'He who has eyes', Aethyr LIN, Spirit (All Elements) element, Tarot The World, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Aquarius, embodying the essence: 'In PARAOAN's presence, the veil of ordinary reality grows thin a mysterious sense of the universal p...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

profile_data.title: 'He who has eyes'
profile_data.essence: In PARAOAN's presence, the veil of ordinary reality grows thin a mysterious sense of the universal permeates the air, hinting at transcendent truths beyond form.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Veil of Transcendence; leads oak-crowned hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-dimensional crystalline structure representing the intersectionality of spiritual vision and universal consciousness, with fractal edges that shift between organic and geometric forms, symbolizing the liminal space between perception and transcendence
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents spiritual insight and Aquarian energy, while silver-white embodies the pure spirit element and transcendent vision of LIN Aethyr
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing cosmic interconnectedness and multi-dimensional perception
